EmailTemplate.name: Associate Mentor Application Acceptance (Redundant)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Associate Mentor application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for applying for the role of {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c} with The Challenge Network. We are delighted to tell you that your application has been successful. We will be in touch in due course with details of training.
In the meantime if you have any questions please contact associate.mentors@the-challenge.org
Many thanks and best wishes,
The Challenge Society
